item.title: New rules for cosmetic injectables aim to make the industry safer. Will they work?
item.description: New guidelines to regulate Australia's booming cosmetic procedures industry have been called "tough" and "a crackdown" in media reports this week.

item.title: Long-lasting HIV prevention shot headed toward approval
item.description: FA new injection to prevent HIV is expected to be approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) later this month.
